duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and mentor members of tax team to greater levels of effectiveness and engagement
Improve processes by developing or implementing best practices
Provide innovative tax planning and review complex income tax returns
Manage tax provision and tax compliance process
Maintain tax balances on general ledger
Prepare all tax papers on a regular basis and handle all information data requests
Support the production of the annual budget and forecasts for the tax department
Comply with local, state, and federal government reporting requirements and tax filings

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in accounting, finance, business administration or related field (Master's preferred)
